alert.note: Alert for Graham; Sheridan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 10:39PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Sheridan and southwestern Graham Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1039 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Park, or 10 miles northeast of Grainfield. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Sheridan and southwestern Graham Counties, including the following locations... Saint Peter, Tasco and Studley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northwestern and west central Kansas.
